name: Space Overlord: I got Isekai'd into a Sci-fi World
summary: Space Overlord I got Isekai'd into a Sci fi World is a unique take on the Isekai genre. HuniePop-like interactions with quests, bosses, and Choice-Driven stories. Go on missions, take over the empire, or join the Renegade Pact.The best of all worlds: a dating sim, an Isekai comic, and a RPG.
